text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/medmorph/CodeSystem/us-ph-report-initiation-types defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
subscription-notification Indicates a report was initiation based on a Subscription Notification.Indicates that a report creation was initiated based on a notification to a subscription topic.
timer-notification Indicates a report was initiation based on a Subscription Notification.Indicates that a report creation was initiated based on a timer expiration. The timer can be absolute or a relative timer.
manually-initiated Indicates a report was initiated to a manual action by the provider.Indicates that a report creation was initiated manually by a provider.
alternately-initiated Indicates a report was initiated in an alternate way by the provider.Indicates that a report creation was initiated in an alternate way by the provider.

name: USPublicHealthReportInitiationTypes
title: US Public Health Report Initiation Type Codes
publisher: HL7 International - Public Health Work Group
description: The US Public Health Report Initiation Type CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying how the message was initiated.

concept.display: Indicates a report was initiation based on a Subscription Notification.
concept.definition: Indicates that a report creation was initiated based on a notification to a subscription topic.

concept.display: Indicates a report was initiation based on a Subscription Notification.
concept.definition: Indicates that a report creation was initiated based on a timer expiration. The timer can be absolute or a relative timer.

concept.display: Indicates a report was initiated to a manual action by the provider.
concept.definition: Indicates that a report creation was initiated manually by a provider.

concept.display: Indicates a report was initiated in an alternate way by the provider.
concept.definition: Indicates that a report creation was initiated in an alternate way by the provider.
